summary: Aurora is a powerful Breton follower, located in The Bannered Mare in Whiterun. She levels with the Dragonborn, and is quite the feisty fighter. She is an expert in Archery and One-handed, and specializes in Light Armor. Aurora is also unique: She can shout with the Dragonborn!
descriptionHtml:
Ok people. I have never made a mod before. LIke, ever. I just recently discovered [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/4554/?tab=2&navtag=http%3A%2F%2Fwww.nexusmods.com%2Fskyrim%2Fajax%2Fmodfiles%2F%3Fid%3D4554&pUp=1]Skyrim NPC Editor[color=#000000] [color=#ffffff]and it's absolutely amazing and easy to use.
<br /><br />In short, I just wanted to test out the Editor system, and compare it to Skyrim Creation Kit, which I personally despise.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Now let's talk about Aurora.
<br /><br />-Located in Bannered Mare in Whiterun
<br /><br />-Potential follower (obviously)
<br /><br />-Potential marriage
<br /><br />-She is based off Muiri, but I deleted Muiri's AI Packages
<br /><br />-AI Packages: Sleep in Bannered Mare, Stays in Bannered Mare, Adrienne Avenicci Walk in Whiterun
<br /><br />- Aurora is HIGHLY agressive
<br /><br />-Foolhardy when it comes to courage
<br /><br />-Can learn new shouts
<br /><br />-Has several shouts of her own
<br /><br />-Has Dragonscale Armor
<br /><br />-Expert/Master in One-handed and Archer; Specializes in Light Armor
<br /><br />
<br /><br />Again, I've never made a mod. If it doesn't work, tell me.
<br /><br />If you can tell me how to fix it, tell me.
<br /><br />Suggestions? Tell me.
<br /><br />Basically, give me input.
<br /><br />
<br /><br />INSTALLATION
<br /><br />-Download using NMM
<br /><br />
<br /><br />or
<br /><br />
<br /><br />-Download Manually; drop .bsa and .esp into Mod Manager or Skyrim/Data folder
<br /><br />
<br /><br />[i]Should be compatible with all other mods. No DLC required, compatible with DLC.[/i][/color][/color][/url]
author: jukeflux
